remarks: Associative law for Hilbert lattice join.  From definition of lattice in [Kalmbach] p. 14.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ch0le.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chjcl.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chjass.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
chjassi $p |- ( ( A vH B ) vH C ) = ( A vH ( B vH C ) ) $.
